verses.text: Now \w Hiram|strong="H2438"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Tyre|strong="H6865"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w messengers|strong="H4397"\w* to \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, and \w timber|strong="H6086"\w* of \w cedars|strong="H0730"\w*, with \w masons|strong="H7023"\w* and \w carpenters|strong="H2796"\w*, to \w build|strong="H1129"\w* him an \w house|strong="H1004"\w*.

And \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w perceived|strong="H3045"\w* that the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* had \w confirmed|strong="H3559"\w* him \w king|strong="H4428"\w* over \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, for his \w kingdom|strong="H4438"\w* was lifted \w up|strong="H5375"\w* on \w high|strong="H4605"\w*, because of his \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

¶ And \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* more \w wives|strong="H0802"\w* at \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*: and \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w begat|strong="H3205"\w* more \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* and \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w*.\f + \fr 14.3 \ft more: Heb. yet\f*

Now these \add are\add* the \w names|strong="H8034"\w* of \add his\add* \w children|strong="H3205"\w* which he had in \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*; \w Shammua|strong="H8051"\w*, and \w Shobab|strong="H7727"\w*, \w Nathan|strong="H5416"\w*, and \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w*,
And \w Ibhar|strong="H2984"\w*, and \w Elishua|strong="H0474"\w*, and \w Elpalet|strong="H0467"\w*,
And \w Nogah|strong="H5052"\w*, and \w Nepheg|strong="H5298"\w*, and \w Japhia|strong="H3309"\w*,
And \w Elishama|strong="H0476"\w*, and \w Beeliada|strong="H1182"\w*, and \w Eliphalet|strong="H0467"\w*.\f + \fr 14.7 \ft Beeliada: also called, Eliada\f*

¶ And when the \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* that \w David|strong="H1732"\w* was \w anointed|strong="H4886"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* over all \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, all the \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w* went \w up|strong="H5927"\w* to \w seek|strong="H1245"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*. And \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \add of it\add*, and went \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w against|strong="H6440"\w* them.
And the \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w* and \w spread|strong="H6584"\w* themselves in the \w valley|strong="H6010"\w* of \w Rephaim|strong="H7497"\w*.

And \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w enquired|strong="H7592"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, Shall I go \w up|strong="H5927"\w* against the \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w*? and wilt thou \w deliver|strong="H5414"\w* them into mine \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*? And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto him, Go \w up|strong="H5927"\w*; for I will \w deliver|strong="H5414"\w* them into thine \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*.

So they came \w up|strong="H5927"\w* to \w Baal-perazim|strong="H1188"\w*; and \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w smote|strong="H5221"\w* them there. Then \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \w God|strong="H0430"\w* hath broken \w in|strong="H6555"\w* upon mine \w enemies|strong="H0341"\w* by mine \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* like the breaking \w forth|strong="H6556"\w* of \w waters|strong="H4325"\w*: therefore they \w called|strong="H7121"\w* the \w name|strong="H8034"\w* of that \w place|strong="H4725"\w* \w Baal-perazim|strong="H1188"\w*.\f + \fr 14.11 \ft Baal-perazim: that is, A place of breaches\f*

And when they had \w left|strong="H5800"\w* their \w gods|strong="H0430"\w* there, \w David|strong="H1732"\w* gave a \w commandment|strong="H0559"\w*, and they were \w burned|strong="H8313"\w* with \w fire|strong="H0784"\w*.
And the \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w* yet \w again|strong="H3254"\w* spread themselves \w abroad|strong="H6584"\w* in the \w valley|strong="H6010"\w*.

Therefore \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w enquired|strong="H7592"\w* again of \w God|strong="H0430"\w*; and \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto him, Go not \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* them; turn \w away|strong="H5437"\w* from them, and \w come|strong="H0935"\w* upon them over \w against|strong="H4136"\w* the mulberry \w trees|strong="H1057"\w*.

And it shall be, when thou shalt \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* a \w sound|strong="H6963"\w* of \w going|strong="H6807"\w* in the \w tops|strong="H7218"\w* of the mulberry \w trees|strong="H1057"\w*, \add that\add* then thou shalt go \w out|strong="H3318"\w* to \w battle|strong="H4421"\w*: for \w God|strong="H0430"\w* is gone \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* thee to \w smite|strong="H5221"\w* the \w host|strong="H4264"\w* of the \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w*.

\w David|strong="H1732"\w* therefore \w did|strong="H6213"\w* as \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* him: and they \w smote|strong="H5221"\w* the \w host|strong="H4264"\w* of the \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w* from \w Gibeon|strong="H1391"\w* even to \w Gazer|strong="H1507"\w*.\f + \fr 14.16 \ft Gibeon: also called, Geba\f*

And the \w fame|strong="H8034"\w* of \w David|strong="H1732"\w* went \w out|strong="H3318"\w* into all \w lands|strong="H0776"\w*; and the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w brought|strong="H5414"\w* the \w fear|strong="H6343"\w* of him upon all \w nations|strong="H1471"\w*.
